\part{\textcyr{\CYRV\cyrery\cyrch\cyri\cyrs\cyrl\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrz\cyrb\cyrery\cyrt\cyro\cyrch\cyrn\cyro\cyrg\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrk\cyra}}

\textcyr{\CYRP\cyrr\cyre\cyrd\cyrl\cyra\cyrg\cyra\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyri\cyrz\cyru\cyrch\cyri\cyrt\cyrsftsn} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyro\cyrp\cyrr\cyro\cyrs}
\textcyr{\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrl\cyri\cyrch\cyri\cyri} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrz\cyrb\cyrery\cyrt\cyro\cyrch\cyrn\cyro\cyrg\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrk\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyrv\cyru\cyrh}-\textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrn\cyrt\cyra\cyrk\cyrt\cyrn\cyro\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyrk\cyrv\cyri\cyrd\cyre}, \textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyro\cyrd\cyrn\cyro\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyri\cyrz} \textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrn\cyrt\cyra\cyrk\cyrt\cyro\cyrv}
\textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrt\cyro\cyrr\cyro\cyrg\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrt\cyra\cyrn\cyro\cyrv\cyrya\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrk\cyra\cyrk\cyrk\cyri\cyrm}-\textcyr{\cyrt\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyri\cyrch\cyri\cyrn\cyra\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyra\cyrzh\cyrn\cyrery}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrs\cyrsh\cyri\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrg\cyra\cyrr\cyrm\cyro\cyrn\cyri\cyrk\cyri}
(\textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrd\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrb\cyru\cyrd\cyre\cyrt}
\textcyr{\cyrr\cyra\cyrz\cyro\cyrb\cyrr\cyra\cyrt\cyrsftsn\cyrs\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrs} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyre\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrch\cyrt\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrt\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrm\cyro\cyrg\cyru\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyrb\cyrery\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrz\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyri\cyrch\cyri\cyrn\cyrery}..).
\textcyr{\CYRD\cyra\cyrl\cyre\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyra\cyrk\cyro\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrn\cyrt\cyra\cyrk\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrb\cyru\cyrd\cyru}
\textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrz\cyrery\cyrv\cyra\cyrt\cyrsftsn} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyre\cyro\cyrb\cyrery\cyrch\cyrn\cyrery\cyrm}.
\textcyr{\CYRP\cyrr\cyre\cyrzh\cyrd\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrch\cyre\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyre\cyrh\cyro\cyrd\cyri\cyrt\cyrsftsn} \textcyr{\cyrk}
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyrk\cyrv\cyri\cyrd\cyru} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyre\cyrd\cyrl\cyra\cyrg\cyra\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrv\cyrt\cyro\cyrr\cyri\cyrt\cyrsftsn} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrk\cyrl\cyra\cyrd\cyrk\cyri}
\textcyr{\cyrk\cyra\cyrs\cyra\cyryu\cyri\cyre\cyrs\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrk\cyrl\cyra\cyrs\cyrs\cyri\cyrch\cyre\cyrs\cyrk\cyro\cyrg\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrf\cyrf\cyre\cyrk\cyrt\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyrzh\cyro\cyrz\cyre\cyrf\cyrs\cyro\cyrn\cyra},
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrn\cyrya\cyrt\cyrsftsn} \textcyr{\cyrk\cyra\cyrk}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyra\cyryu\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyro\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrt}-\textcyr{\cyra\cyrm\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyrn\cyrery\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrh\cyra\cyrr\cyra\cyrk\cyrt\cyre\cyrr\cyri\cyrs\cyrt\cyri\cyrk\cyri}
\textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrt\cyri\cyrh} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyra\cyrya\cyrh}
\textcyr{\cyrch\cyrt\cyro\cyrb\cyrery} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrn\cyrya\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrk\cyra\cyrk} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrzh\cyrn\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrd\cyro\cyrishrt\cyrt\cyri}
\textcyr{\cyrk} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrch\cyri\cyrs\cyrl\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyryu}
\textcyr{\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrch\cyrt\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrya\cyrv\cyrl\cyrya\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyri\cyrch\cyri\cyrn\cyro\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrya\cyrv\cyrl\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyri\cyrb\cyrery\cyrt\cyro\cyrch\cyrn\cyro\cyrg\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrk\cyra}.

\section{\textcyr{\CYRN\cyre\cyrs\cyrt\cyra\cyrc\cyri\cyro\cyrn\cyra\cyrr\cyrn\cyrery\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrf\cyrf\cyre\cyrk\cyrt} \textcyr{\CYRD\cyrzh\cyro\cyrz\cyre\cyrf\cyrs\cyro\cyrn\cyra}.
RSJ-model.}

\textcyr{\CYRV} RSJ \textcyr{\cyrm\cyro\cyrd\cyre\cyrl\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrz\cyra\cyrm\cyre\cyrn\cyrya\cyrya},
\textcyr{\cyrd\cyrzh\cyro\cyrz\cyre\cyrf\cyrs\cyro\cyrn\cyro\cyrv\cyrs\cyrk\cyri\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyre\cyrh\cyro\cyrd} \textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrk\cyrv\cyri\cyrv\cyra\cyrl\cyre\cyrn\cyrt\cyrn\cyro\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyrh\cyre\cyrm\cyro\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyrs} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyra\cyrr\cyrr\cyra\cyrl\cyre\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrn\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrd\cyrk\cyrl\cyrch\cyre\cyrn\cyrn\cyrery\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyro\cyrp\cyrr\cyro\cyrt\cyri\cyrv\cyrl\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre\cyrm},
\textcyr{\cyri\cyrm\cyre\cyre\cyrm}:

\textcyr{\CYRT\cyro\cyrk} \textcyr{\cyrch\cyre\cyrr\cyre\cyrz} ``\textcyr{\cyrch\cyri\cyrs\cyrt\cyrery\cyrishrt}''
\textcyr{\cyrd\cyrzh}. \textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrn\cyrt\cyra\cyrk\cyrt}:
$I_{c}\sin\gamma$, \textcyr{\cyrg\cyrd\cyre} $\gamma$ - \textcyr{\cyrr\cyra\cyrz\cyrn\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrf\cyra\cyrz}, \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrr\cyra\cyrz\cyrn\cyrery\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyrt\cyro\cyrr\cyro\cyrn\cyrery} \textcyr{\cyro\cyrt}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyre\cyrh\cyro\cyrd\cyra}.

\textcyr{\CYRT\cyro\cyrk} \textcyr{\cyrch\cyre\cyrr\cyre\cyrz} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyro\cyrp\cyrr\cyro\cyrt\cyri\cyrv\cyrl\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre}
$R$: $U/R$, \textcyr{\cyrg\cyrd\cyre} $U$, \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrv\cyrya\cyrz\cyra\cyrn\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrs} $\gamma$ \textcyr{\cyrs\cyro\cyro\cyrt\cyrn\cyro\cyrsh\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre\cyrm}
$2eU=\hbar\frac{\partial\gamma}{\partial t}$. \textcyr{\CYRI\cyrm\cyre\cyre\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyra\cyrk\cyri\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyro\cyrb\cyrr\cyra\cyrz\cyro\cyrm}:
\begin{equation}
I=I_{c}\sin\gamma+\frac{\hbar}{2eR}\frac{\partial\gamma}{\partial t}\label{eq:RSJ}
\end{equation}

\textcyr{\CYRN\cyru\cyrzh\cyrn\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrz\cyra\cyrm\cyre\cyrt\cyri\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrch\cyrt\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrs} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrch\cyrk\cyri}
\textcyr{\cyrz\cyrr\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya} RCSJ \textcyr{\cyrm\cyro\cyrd\cyre\cyrl\cyri},
\textcyr{\cyro\cyrt\cyrl\cyri\cyrch\cyra\cyryu\cyrshch\cyre\cyrishrt\cyrs\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyrk\cyrl\cyryu\cyrch\cyre\cyrn\cyrn\cyro\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyre\cyrm\cyrk\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyrsftsn\cyryu}, \textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrp\cyri\cyrs\cyra\cyrn\cyrn\cyro\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrr\cyra\cyrzh\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyro\cyro\cyrt\cyrv\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrt\cyrv\cyru\cyre\cyrt}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyre\cyrd\cyre\cyrl\cyru} \textcyr{\cyrm\cyra\cyrl\cyro\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyre\cyrm\cyrk\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyri}, \textcyr{\cyri\cyrl\cyri}
\textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyre\cyrr\cyrm\cyri\cyrn\cyra\cyrh}
washboard-\textcyr{\cyrm\cyro\cyrd\cyre\cyrl\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrb\cyre\cyrs\cyrk\cyro\cyrn\cyre\cyrch\cyrn\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrm\cyra\cyrl\cyro\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyrm\cyra\cyrs\cyrs\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrch\cyra\cyrs\cyrt\cyri\cyrc\cyrery}, \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyri\cyrv\cyro\cyrd\cyrya\cyrshch\cyre\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrk} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyre\cyro\cyrb\cyrl\cyra\cyrd\cyra\cyrn\cyri\cyryu}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyrya\cyrz\cyrk\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrd}
\textcyr{\cyri\cyrn\cyre\cyrr\cyrc\cyri\cyre\cyrishrt} (\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrt\cyro\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrh\cyro\cyrr\cyro\cyrsh\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrb\cyrery} \textcyr{\cyrr\cyra\cyrs\cyrs\cyrm\cyro\cyrt\cyrr\cyre\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyro\cyrb\cyrshch\cyri\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyra\cyrishrt})

\textcyr{\CYRN\cyra\cyrsh\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrc\cyre\cyrl\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrk\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyri\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrz\cyra\cyrv\cyri\cyrs\cyri\cyrm\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrp\cyrr\cyrya\cyrzh\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyro\cyrt}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyrr\cyre\cyrm\cyre\cyrn\cyri}. 

\textcyr{\CYRO\cyrb\cyre\cyrz\cyrr\cyra\cyrz\cyrm\cyre\cyrr\cyri\cyrch\cyra\cyre\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyru\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyrn\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre}, \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrv\cyro\cyrd\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrk}: $\tilde{I}=I/I_{c}$ \textcyr{\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrch\cyra\cyrs\cyrt\cyro\cyrt\cyru}:
$\omega=2eI_{c}R/\hbar$. \textcyr{\CYRP\cyro\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyri\cyrm}
(\textcyr{\cyrd\cyra\cyrl\cyre\cyre} \textcyr{\cyro\cyrp\cyru\cyrs\cyrk\cyra\cyre\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyri\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrd\cyru} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyrl\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrk\cyrr\cyra\cyrt\cyrk\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyri}):
\begin{equation}
I-\sin\gamma=\frac{\partial\gamma}{\partial t}\label{eq:RSJ_dl}
\end{equation}

\textcyr{\CYRR\cyre\cyrsh\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrz\cyra\cyrp\cyri\cyrsh\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyri\cyrd\cyre}:
\begin{equation}
t=\int\frac{d\gamma}{I-\sin\gamma}\label{eq:RSJsol}
\end{equation}

\textcyr{\cyrs} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrch\cyrn\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyrsftsn\cyryu}
\textcyr{\cyrd\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyro\cyri\cyrz\cyrv\cyro\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrn\cyro\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrn\cyrs\cyrt\cyra\cyrn\cyrt\cyrery} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyro\cyro\cyrt\cyrv\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrt\cyrv\cyru\cyryu\cyrshch\cyre\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrch\cyra\cyrl\cyru} \textcyr{\cyro\cyrt\cyrs\cyrch\cyre\cyrt\cyra}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyrr\cyre\cyrm\cyre\cyrn\cyri}.

\textcyr{\CYRI\cyrn\cyrt\cyre\cyrg\cyrr\cyra\cyrl} \textcyr{\cyrs}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrm\cyro\cyrshch\cyrsftsn\cyryu} \textcyr{\cyru\cyrn\cyri\cyrv\cyre\cyrr\cyrs\cyra\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrn\cyro\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyrr\cyri\cyrg\cyro\cyrn\cyro\cyrm\cyre\cyrt\cyrr\cyri\cyrch\cyre\cyrs\cyrk\cyro\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrd\cyrs\cyrt\cyra\cyrn\cyro\cyrv\cyrk\cyri}
$x=\tan\frac{\gamma}{2}$,$d\gamma=\frac{2dx}{x^{2}+1}$, $\sin\gamma=\frac{2x}{x^{2}+1}$
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyri\cyrv\cyro\cyrd\cyri\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrk}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyra\cyrb\cyrl\cyri\cyrch\cyrn\cyro\cyrm\cyru} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyri\cyrd\cyru}:
\begin{align}
t & =\int\frac{d\gamma}{I-\sin\gamma}=\int\frac{2dx}{I(x^{2}+1)-2x}=\int\frac{2Idx}{I^{2}x^{2}-2Ix+I^{2}}=\nonumber \\
 & =\frac{2I}{I^{2}-1}\int\frac{dx}{\left(\frac{Ix-1}{\sqrt{I^{2}-1}}\right)^{2}+1}=\frac{2\sqrt{I^{2}-1}}{I^{2}-1}\int\frac{d\frac{Ix-1}{\sqrt{I^{2}-1}}}{(\frac{Ix+1}{\sqrt{I^{2}+1}})^{2}+1}=\label{eq:RSJsol_an}\\
 & =\frac{2}{\sqrt{I^{2}-1}}\arctan\frac{I\tan\frac{\gamma}{2}-1}{\sqrt{I^{2}-1}}\nonumber 
\end{align}

\textcyr{\CYRV\cyrery\cyrr\cyra\cyrz\cyri\cyrm} $t$ \textcyr{\cyri\cyrz}
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyro\cyro\cyrt\cyrn}. (\ref{eq:RSJsol_an}):
\begin{align}
\frac{I\tan\frac{\gamma}{2}-1}{\sqrt{I^{2}-1}} & =\tan\left(\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\frac{t}{2}\right)\nonumber \\
I\tan\frac{\gamma}{2} & =\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\tan\left(\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\frac{t}{2}\right)+1\label{eq:RSGsol_an_dir}\\
\gamma & =2\arctan\frac{1}{I}\left\{ \sqrt{I^{2}-1}\tan\left(\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\frac{t}{2}\right)+1\right\} \nonumber 
\end{align}

\textcyr{\CYRT\cyre\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyrsftsn} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrs\cyrch\cyri\cyrt\cyra\cyre\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyro\cyri\cyrz\cyrv\cyro\cyrd\cyrn\cyru\cyryu}:
\begin{align*}
\frac{\partial\gamma}{\partial t} & =2\frac{\partial}{\partial t}\arctan\left\{ \frac{\sqrt{I^{2}-1}}{I}\tan\left(\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\frac{t}{2}\right)+\frac{1}{I}\right\} \\
 & =2\frac{I^{2}-1}{2I}\left\{ \left[\left(\frac{\sqrt{I^{2}-1}}{I}\tan\left(\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\frac{t}{2}\right)+\frac{1}{I}\right)^{2}+1\right]\cos^{2}\left(\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\frac{t}{2}\right)\right\} ^{-1}\\
 & =\frac{I^{2}-1}{I}\left\{ \left(\frac{\sqrt{I^{2}-1}}{I}\sin\left(\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\frac{t}{2}\right)+\frac{1}{I}\cos\left(\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\frac{t}{2}\right)\right)^{2}+\cos^{2}\left(\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\frac{t}{2}\right)\right\} ^{-1}\\
 & =\frac{I^{2}-1}{I}\left\{ \frac{I^{2}-1}{I^{2}}\sin^{2}\left(\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\frac{t}{2}\right)+\frac{1}{I^{2}}\cos^{2}\left(\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\frac{t}{2}\right)+\cos^{2}\left(\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\frac{t}{2}\right)+\frac{\sqrt{I^{2}-1}}{I^{2}}\sin\left(t\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\right)\right\} ^{-1}\\
 & =\frac{I^{2}-1}{I+\frac{1}{I}\cos\left(t\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\right)+\frac{\sqrt{I^{2}-1}}{I^{2}}\sin\left(t\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\right)}
\end{align*}

\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyra\cyre\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrr\cyra\cyrzh\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre},
\textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrt\cyro\cyrr\cyro\cyre} \textcyr{\cyro\cyrt\cyrl\cyri\cyrch\cyra\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyro\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrs\cyrk\cyro\cyrm\cyro\cyrg\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrk\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrd\cyrv\cyri\cyrg\cyro\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrr\cyre\cyrm\cyre\cyrn\cyri}:
\begin{equation}
\frac{\partial\gamma}{\partial t}=\frac{I^{2}-1}{I+\cos\left(t\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\right)}
\end{equation}

\textcyr{\CYRCH\cyrt\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrs} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrch\cyrn\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyrsftsn\cyryu}
\textcyr{\cyrd\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyre\cyro\cyrb\cyro\cyrz\cyrn\cyra\cyrch\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyro\cyrv\cyrp\cyra\cyrd\cyra\cyre\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyrs}
\textcyr{\cyrn\cyru\cyrzh\cyrn\cyrery\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrr\cyra\cyrzh\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrd\cyrl\cyrya} $U$. \textcyr{\CYRV\cyro\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrt}
\textcyr{\cyra\cyrm\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyrn\cyra\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrh\cyra\cyrr\cyra\cyrk\cyrt\cyre\cyrr\cyri\cyrs\cyrt\cyri\cyrk\cyra}
\textcyr{\cyri\cyrz\cyrv\cyrl\cyre\cyrk\cyra\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyru\cyrs\cyrr\cyre\cyrd\cyrn\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrt\cyro\cyrg\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrr\cyra\cyrzh\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrr\cyre\cyrm\cyre\cyrn\cyri}.
\textcyr{\CYRP\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyri\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrn\cyrery\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyro\cyrt\cyrv\cyre\cyrt}, \textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrt\cyro\cyrr\cyro\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyro\cyrs\cyrs\cyrt\cyra\cyrn\cyro\cyrv\cyrl\cyre\cyrn\cyrn\cyrery}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyrs\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrr\cyra\cyrz\cyrm\cyre\cyrr\cyrn\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyri}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrg\cyrl\cyrya\cyrd\cyri\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyra\cyrk}:
\[
\overline{U}=R\sqrt{I^{2}-I_{c}^{2}}
\]

\section{\textcyr{\CYRO\cyrb\cyrery\cyrk\cyrn\cyro\cyrv\cyre\cyrn\cyrn\cyrery\cyrishrt}
SQUID. RSJ-model.}

\textcyr{\CYRN\cyre\cyrt\cyrr\cyru\cyrd\cyrn\cyro} \textcyr{\cyru\cyrb\cyre\cyrd\cyri\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya},
\textcyr{\cyrch\cyrt\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyra\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyrk\cyrv\cyri\cyrd\cyra} \textcyr{\cyro\cyrt\cyrl\cyri\cyrch\cyra\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyro\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyrr\cyra\cyrs\cyrs\cyrm\cyro\cyrt\cyrr\cyre\cyrn\cyrn\cyro\cyrg\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrr\cyra\cyrn\cyre\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrl\cyre\cyrsh\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyre\cyrn\cyro\cyrr\cyrm\cyri\cyrr\cyro\cyrv\cyrk\cyro\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrch\cyra\cyrs\cyrt\cyro\cyrt\cyrery} \textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrl\cyre\cyrb\cyra\cyrn\cyri\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrp\cyrr\cyrya\cyrzh\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyri}
\textcyr{\cyrk\cyrr\cyri\cyrt\cyri\cyrch\cyre\cyrs\cyrk\cyro\cyrg\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrk\cyra}.

\textcyr{\CYRD\cyre\cyrishrt\cyrs\cyrt\cyrv\cyri\cyrt\cyre\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrn\cyro},
\textcyr{\cyru\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyrn\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrt\cyro\cyrr\cyro\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrd\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrr\cyre\cyrsh\cyri\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrn\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrt\cyro\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyrr\cyra\cyrz}
\textcyr{\cyri\cyrm\cyre\cyre\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyri\cyrd}:
\begin{equation}
I=I_{c}\sin\gamma+I_{c}\sin(\gamma+\alpha)+\frac{\hbar}{2eR}\frac{\partial\gamma}{\partial t}\label{eq:SQUID_RSJ}
\end{equation}

\textcyr{\cyrg\cyrd\cyre} $\alpha$- \textcyr{\cyrr\cyra\cyrz\cyrn\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrf\cyra\cyrz} \textcyr{\cyrm\cyre\cyrzh\cyrd\cyru} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyrv\cyru\cyrm\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrn\cyrt\cyra\cyrk\cyrt\cyra\cyrm\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrk\cyrv\cyri\cyrd\cyra},
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyrv\cyrya\cyrz\cyra\cyrn\cyrn\cyra\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrs}
\textcyr{\cyrm\cyra\cyrg\cyrn\cyri\cyrt\cyrn\cyrery\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrt\cyro\cyrk\cyro\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrch\cyre\cyrr\cyre\cyrz} \textcyr{\cyre\cyrg\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrc\cyro}.
\textcyr{\CYREREV\cyrt\cyro} \textcyr{\cyru\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyrn\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyri\cyrv\cyro\cyrd\cyri\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrk}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyri\cyrd\cyru}:
\begin{equation}
I=I_{c}2\sin(\gamma+\frac{\alpha}{2})\cos\frac{\alpha}{2}+\frac{\hbar}{2eR}\frac{\partial\gamma}{\partial t}
\end{equation}

\textcyr{\CYRR\cyre\cyrsh\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrt\cyro\cyrg\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyru\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyrn\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrm\cyre\cyre\cyrt}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyre\cyrzh\cyrn\cyri\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyri\cyrd}
(\ref{eq:RSJsol}), \textcyr{\cyrg\cyrd\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrb\cyre\cyrz\cyrr\cyra\cyrz\cyrm\cyre\cyrr\cyrn\cyrery\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrk} \textcyr{\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrr\cyre\cyrm\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyri\cyrm\cyre\cyryu\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyri\cyrd}:
\begin{align}
\tilde{I} & =\frac{I}{I_{c}^{'}} & I_{c}^{'}=2I_{c}\cos\frac{\alpha}{2}\nonumber \\
\tilde{t} & =\omega^{'}t & \omega^{'}=2\omega\cos\frac{\alpha}{2}\label{eq:SQUID_dim}
\end{align}

\textcyr{\CYRV\CYRA\CYRH} \textcyr{\cyrb\cyru\cyrd\cyre\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyrl\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrt\cyro\cyrg\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyra\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrb\cyru\cyrd\cyre\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrch\cyrn\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyra\cyrk\cyra\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrzh\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrk\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrs} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyre\cyrn\cyro\cyrr\cyrm\cyri\cyrr\cyro\cyrv\cyra\cyrn\cyrn\cyrery\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrz\cyrn\cyra\cyrch\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrk\cyrr\cyri\cyrt\cyri\cyrch\cyre\cyrs\cyrk\cyro\cyrg\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrk\cyra}, \textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrt\cyro\cyrr\cyrery\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyre\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyrsftsn} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrz\cyrm\cyre\cyrn\cyrya\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrm\cyra\cyrg\cyrn\cyri\cyrt\cyrn\cyro\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrm\cyro\cyrzh\cyrn\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrm\cyre\cyrn\cyrya\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyrd\cyre\cyrl\cyra\cyrh}
\textcyr{\cyro\cyrt} $-2I_{c}$ \textcyr{\cyrd\cyro} $2I_{c}$.

\section{\textcyr{\CYRN\cyre\cyro\cyrb\cyrery\cyrch\cyrn\cyrery\cyrishrt}
SQUID. RSJ-model.}

\paragraph*{\textcyr{\CYRP\cyro\cyrp\cyrery\cyrt\cyrk\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrr\cyre\cyrsh\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyrl\cyro\cyrb}}

\textcyr{\CYRV} \textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrt\cyro\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyra\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyru\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyrn\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrd\cyro\cyrb\cyra\cyrv\cyrl\cyrya\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyre\cyrshch\cyre} \textcyr{\cyro\cyrd\cyri\cyrn} \textcyr{\cyrch\cyrl\cyre\cyrn}:
\begin{equation}
I=I_{c}\left(\sin\gamma+a\sin2\gamma\right)+I_{c}\sin(\gamma+\alpha)+\frac{\hbar}{2e}\frac{\partial\gamma}{\partial t}\label{eq:modSQUID_RSJ}
\end{equation}

\textcyr{\cyrg\cyrd\cyre} $a$ \textcyr{\cyrm\cyrery} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrch\cyri\cyrt\cyra\cyre\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrm\cyra\cyrl\cyrery\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyra\cyrr\cyra\cyrm\cyre\cyrt\cyrr\cyro\cyrm}.
\textcyr{\CYRE\cyrg\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrr\cyre\cyrsh\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyri\cyrm\cyre\cyre\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyri\cyrd}:
\begin{equation}
t=\int\frac{d\gamma}{I-\sin\gamma-a\sin(2\gamma+\alpha)}\label{eq:mod_SQUID_sol}
\end{equation}

\textcyr{\CYRR\cyra\cyrs\cyrk\cyrl\cyra\cyrd\cyrery\cyrv\cyra\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrz\cyrn\cyra\cyrm\cyre\cyrn\cyra\cyrt\cyre\cyrl\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyra\cyrr\cyra\cyrm\cyre\cyrt\cyrr\cyru}
$a$, \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyro\cyrv\cyre\cyrd\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrzh\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrk\cyrl\cyra\cyrd\cyrk\cyri}
\textcyr{\cyrch\cyrt\cyro} \textcyr{\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyre\cyrd\cyrery\cyrd\cyru\cyrshch\cyri\cyrh}
\textcyr{\cyrr\cyra\cyrz\cyrd\cyre\cyrl\cyra\cyrh} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyri\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyrv\cyro\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrr\cyrya\cyrd\cyrk\cyre}:
\begin{align}
t & =f_{0}(\gamma)+af_{1}(\gamma,\alpha);\label{eq:mod_SQUID_sol_gen_form}\\
\text{\textcyr{\cyrg}\textcyr{\cyrd}\textcyr{\cyre} }f_{0}(\gamma)\text{ } & =\frac{2}{\sqrt{I^{2}-1}}\arctan\frac{I\tan\frac{\gamma}{2}-1}{\sqrt{I^{2}-1}}\\
f_{1}(\gamma,\alpha) & =\int\frac{\sin(\alpha+2\gamma)}{(I-\sin\gamma)^{2}}d\gamma
\end{align}

$f_{1}(\gamma,\alpha)$ \textcyr{\cyro\cyrk\cyra\cyrz\cyrery\cyrv\cyra\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrd\cyro\cyrv\cyro\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrn\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrg\cyrr\cyro\cyrm\cyro\cyrz\cyrd\cyrk\cyro\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrm\cyrb\cyri\cyrn\cyra\cyrc\cyri\cyre\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyrr\cyri\cyrg\cyro\cyrn\cyro\cyrm\cyre\cyrt\cyrr\cyri\cyrch\cyre\cyrs\cyrk\cyri\cyrh}
\textcyr{\cyrf\cyru\cyrn\cyrk\cyrc\cyri\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyri}
\textcyr{\cyrd\cyre\cyrl\cyra\cyre\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyrb\cyre\cyrz\cyrn\cyra\cyrd\cyre\cyrzh\cyrn\cyrery\cyrm\cyri}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrp\cyrery\cyrt\cyrk\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrch\cyrn\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrr\cyra\cyrz\cyri\cyrt\cyrsftsn} $\gamma$
\textcyr{\cyrk\cyra\cyrk} \textcyr{\cyrf\cyru\cyrn\cyrk\cyrc\cyri\cyryu}
$t$.

\textcyr{\CYRP\cyro\cyrp\cyrr\cyro\cyrb\cyru\cyre\cyrm}, \textcyr{\cyro\cyrd\cyrn\cyra\cyrk\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrr\cyre\cyrsh\cyri\cyrt\cyrsftsn} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrs\cyrl\cyre\cyrd\cyrn\cyre\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyru\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyrn\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrt\cyre\cyrr\cyra\cyrt\cyri\cyrv\cyrn\cyro}:
\begin{align*}
\gamma_{0} & =f_{0}^{-1}(t)=2\arctan\frac{1}{I}\left\{ \sqrt{I^{2}-1}\tan\left(\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\frac{t}{2}\right)+1\right\} \\
\gamma & =\gamma_{0}+\gamma_{1};\;\;\;\gamma_{1}\ll1
\end{align*}

\textcyr{\CYRP\cyro\cyrd\cyrs\cyrt\cyra\cyrv\cyri\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyrv}
\textcyr{\cyru\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyrn\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre} (\ref{eq:mod_SQUID_sol_gen_form})
\textcyr{\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrr\cyra\cyrs\cyrk\cyrl\cyra\cyrd\cyrery\cyrv\cyra\cyrya\cyrs\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrd\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyrv\cyro\cyrg\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrr\cyrya\cyrd\cyrk\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyri\cyrm}:

\[
t=f_{0}(\gamma_{0}+\gamma_{1})+af_{1}(\gamma_{0}+\gamma_{1},\alpha)\approx f_{0}(\gamma_{0})+f{}_{0}^{'}(\gamma_{0})\gamma_{1}+af_{1}(\gamma_{0},\alpha)
\]

\textcyr{\CYRI} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyra\cyrk\cyri\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyro\cyrb\cyrr\cyra\cyrz\cyro\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrd\cyrl\cyrya} $\gamma_{1}$ \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyri\cyrm}:

\begin{equation}
\gamma_{1}=-a\frac{f_{1}(\gamma_{0},\alpha)}{f_{0}^{'}(\gamma_{0})}\label{eq:first_correction_mod_SQUID}
\end{equation}

\textcyr{\CYRV\cyrery\cyrch\cyri\cyrs\cyrl\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyri\cyrv\cyro\cyrd\cyri\cyrt}:

\[
f_{0}^{'}(\gamma_{0})=\frac{\left(\tan^{2}\left(\frac{\gamma_{0}}{2}\right)+1\right)}{I\tan^{2}\left(\frac{\gamma_{0}}{2}\right)+I-2\tan\left(\frac{\gamma_{0}}{2}\right)}=\frac{\cos\left(\omega t+2\right)+2\omega^{2}+1}{(\omega^{2}+1)\left(-2\omega\sin\left(\omega t+2\right)+\cos\left(\omega t+2\right)+2\omega^{2}+1\right)}
\]

\textcyr{\CYRV} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyre\cyrd\cyre\cyrl\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrb\cyro\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrsh\cyri\cyrh}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrk\cyro\cyrv} $I\gg1$, \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyri\cyrm}:
\begin{align*}
f_{0}(\gamma)\text{ } & =\frac{2}{\sqrt{I^{2}-1}}\arctan\frac{I\tan\frac{\gamma}{2}-1}{\sqrt{I^{2}-1}}\approx\frac{\gamma}{I}\\
f_{0}^{'}(\gamma_{0}) & \approx\frac{1}{I}\\
f_{1}(\gamma,\alpha) & =\int\frac{\sin(\alpha+2\gamma)}{(I-\sin\gamma)^{2}}d\gamma\approx\frac{1}{I^{2}}\int\sin(\alpha+2\gamma)d\gamma=-\frac{1}{2I^{2}}\cos(\alpha+2\gamma)\\
\gamma_{1} & =-a\frac{f_{1}(\gamma_{0},\alpha)}{f_{0}^{'}(\gamma_{0})}\approx\frac{a}{2I}\cos(\alpha+2\gamma_{0})\approx\frac{a}{2I}\cos(\alpha+2It)
\end{align*}

\textcyr{\CYRS\cyro\cyrb\cyri\cyrr\cyra\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrs\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyrm\cyre\cyrs\cyrt\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyri\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyrl\cyre\cyrd\cyru\cyryu\cyrshch\cyri\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyro\cyrt\cyrv\cyre\cyrt}
\textcyr{\cyrd\cyrl\cyrya} $\gamma$:
\begin{align*}
\gamma & \approx It+\frac{a}{2I}\cos(\alpha+2It)+O(a,\frac{1}{I})T\\
U & \approx I+a\cos(\alpha+2It)
\end{align*}

\textcyr{\CYRP\cyro\cyrp\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyrk\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrk}
\textcyr{\cyrz\cyra\cyrk\cyro\cyrn\cyru} \textcyr{\CYRO\cyrm\cyra}
\textcyr{\cyro\cyrk\cyra\cyrz\cyrery\cyrv\cyra\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrb\cyrery\cyrs\cyrt\cyrr\cyro\cyro\cyrs\cyrc\cyri\cyrl\cyri\cyrr\cyru\cyryu\cyrshch\cyre\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrb\cyro\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrsh\cyri\cyrh}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrk\cyra\cyrh} \textcyr{\cyri} \textcyr{\cyru\cyrs\cyrr\cyre\cyrd\cyrn\cyri\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyro\cyrl\cyrsftsn}. 

\section{\textcyr{\CYRT\cyre\cyro\cyrr\cyri\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyro\cyrz\cyrm\cyru\cyrshch\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrs\cyrh\cyro\cyrd\cyrn\cyro\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyru\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyrn\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyra\cyrr\cyra\cyrm\cyre\cyrt\cyrr\cyru} $I_{c}/I$}

\subsection{\textcyr{\CYRO\cyrb\cyrery\cyrk\cyrn\cyro\cyrv\cyre\cyrn\cyrn\cyrery\cyrishrt}
SQUID. RSJ-model.}

\paragraph{\textcyr{\CYRO\cyrb\cyrshch\cyra\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrt\cyre\cyrr\cyra\cyrt\cyri\cyrv\cyrn\cyra\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrf\cyro\cyrr\cyrm\cyru\cyrl\cyra}.}

\textcyr{\CYRP\cyro\cyrp\cyrr\cyro\cyrb\cyru\cyre\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyri\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyro\cyrt\cyrv\cyre\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyrl\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyro\cyrb\cyrery\cyrk\cyrn\cyro\cyrv\cyre\cyrn\cyrn\cyro\cyrg\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyrk\cyrv\cyri\cyrd\cyra}, \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyro\cyrv\cyro\cyrd\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyre\cyro\cyrr\cyri\cyryu} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyro\cyrz\cyrm\cyru\cyrshch\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrs\cyrh\cyro\cyrd\cyrn\cyro\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyru\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyrn\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyri}.

\textcyr{\CYRM\cyrery} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyro\cyrl\cyrzh\cyrn\cyrery}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyro\cyrs\cyrp\cyrr\cyro\cyri\cyrz\cyrv\cyre\cyrs\cyrt\cyri}
\textcyr{\cyrr\cyrya\cyrd}
\[
U=\sqrt{I^{2}-1}\approx I-\frac{1}{2}\frac{1}{I}-\frac{1}{8}\frac{1}{I^{3}}-\frac{1}{16}\frac{1}{I^{5}}o\left(\frac{1}{I^{2}}\right)
\]

\textcyr{\CYRI\cyrz} \textcyr{\cyru\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyrn\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya}
\begin{align*}
\dot{\gamma} & =I-\sin\gamma\\
\frac{\partial\gamma}{\partial\tau} & =1-\frac{1}{I}\sin\gamma
\end{align*}

\textcyr{\CYRV} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrs\cyrl\cyre\cyrd\cyrn\cyre\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyru\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyrn\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyrn\cyre\cyrn\cyra}
\textcyr{\cyrz\cyra\cyrm\cyre\cyrn\cyra} $t=I\tau$, \textcyr{\cyrch\cyrt\cyro\cyrb\cyrery}
\textcyr{\cyrya\cyrv\cyrn\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrd\cyre\cyrl\cyri\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrm\cyra\cyrl\cyrery\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyra\cyrr\cyra\cyrm\cyre\cyrt\cyrr}.

\textcyr{\CYRS\cyrt\cyrr\cyro\cyri\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyre\cyro\cyrr\cyri\cyryu}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyro\cyrz\cyrm\cyru\cyrshch\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrishrt}:
\[
\gamma=\gamma_{0}+\gamma_{1}+\gamma_{2}+\dots
\]

\textcyr{\CYRP\cyrr\cyre\cyrd\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyro\cyrzh\cyri\cyrm},
\textcyr{\cyrch\cyrt\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrz\cyrv\cyre\cyrs\cyrt\cyre\cyrn}
\textcyr{\cyrr\cyrya\cyrd} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyrl\cyrya} $\gamma$ \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrp\cyrl\cyro\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrd\cyro} $n-1$ \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrr\cyrya\cyrd\cyrk\cyra}.
\textcyr{\CYRP\cyro\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyri\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrf\cyro\cyrr\cyrm\cyru\cyrl\cyru}
\textcyr{\cyrd\cyrl\cyrya} $n$-\textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrg\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyrp\cyrr\cyrp\cyrr\cyri\cyrb\cyrl\cyri\cyrzh\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya}.
\begin{align*}
\frac{d}{d\tau}\left(\gamma_{0}+\dots+\gamma_{n}\right) & =1-\frac{1}{I}\sin\left(\gamma_{0}+\dots+\gamma_{n}\right)=1-\frac{1}{I}\sin\left(\gamma_{0}+\dots+\gamma_{n-1}\right)\cancelto{1}{\cos\gamma_{n}}+\cancelto{0}{\frac{1}{I}\cos\left(\gamma_{0}+\dots+\gamma_{n}\right)\sin\gamma_{n}}\\
\frac{d}{d\tau}\left(\gamma_{0}+\dots+\gamma_{n}\right) & =1-\frac{1}{I}\sin\left(\gamma_{0}+\dots+\gamma_{n-1}\right)
\end{align*}

\textcyr{\CYRR\cyro\cyrv\cyrn\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrzh\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyra\cyrm\cyro\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyro\cyro\cyrt\cyrn\cyro\cyrsh\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyre\cyrr\cyrn\cyro} \textcyr{\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyrl\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyrs\cyre\cyrh} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrr\cyrya\cyrd\cyrk\cyro\cyrv}
\textcyr{\cyrm\cyre\cyrn\cyrsftsn\cyrsh\cyri\cyrh} $n$ \textcyr{\cyri}
\textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyrch\cyra\cyrs\cyrt\cyrn\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyri}
\textcyr{\cyrd\cyrl\cyrya} $n-1$:
\[
\frac{d}{d\tau}\left(\gamma_{0}+\dots+\gamma_{n-1}\right)=1-\frac{1}{I}\sin\left(\gamma_{0}+\dots+\gamma_{n-2}\right)
\]

\textcyr{\CYRK\cyro\cyrm\cyrb\cyri\cyrn\cyri\cyrr\cyru\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyrv\cyra}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrs\cyrl\cyre\cyrd\cyrn\cyri\cyrh} \textcyr{\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyre\cyrn\cyrt\cyrs\cyrv\cyra}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyri\cyrm}:
\begin{align*}
\frac{d\gamma_{n}}{d\tau} & =\frac{1}{I}\left(\sin\left(\gamma_{0}+\dots+\gamma_{n-2}\right)-\sin\left(\gamma_{0}+\dots+\gamma_{n-1}\right)\right)=\frac{1}{I}\sin\left(\gamma_{0}+\dots+\gamma_{n-2}\right)\overbrace{\left\{ 1-\cos\gamma_{n-1}\right\} }^{\sim\gamma_{n-1}^{2}}-\frac{1}{I}\cos\left(\gamma_{0}+\dots+\gamma_{n-2}\right)\sin\gamma_{n-1}\approx\\
 & \approx-\frac{1}{I}\gamma_{n-1}\cos\gamma_{0}
\end{align*}
\begin{equation}
\frac{d\gamma_{n}}{d\tau}=-\frac{1}{I}\gamma_{n-1}\cos\gamma_{0}\label{eq:iter_SQUID_sol}
\end{equation}

\paragraph{\textcyr{\CYRP\cyre\cyrr\cyrv\cyrery\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrr\cyrya\cyrd\cyrk\cyri}.}

\textcyr{\CYRV\cyrery\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyrn\cyrya\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrch\cyri\cyrs\cyrl\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrd\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyrv\cyro\cyrg\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrr\cyrya\cyrd\cyrk\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrp\cyrr\cyrya\cyrm\cyru\cyryu},
\textcyr{\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyra\cyrl\cyre\cyre} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrs\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrz\cyru\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyre\cyrn\cyrn\cyru\cyryu} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrsh\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrf\cyro\cyrr\cyrm\cyru\cyrl\cyru} (\ref{eq:iter_SQUID_sol})
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyri\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyrl\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyrv\cyrery\cyrh} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrp\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyro\cyrk}
\textcyr{\cyrk} $\gamma$:

\subparagraph{\textcyr{\CYRN\cyru\cyrl\cyre\cyrv\cyro\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrr\cyrya\cyrd\cyro\cyrk}:
\begin{align*}
\frac{d\gamma_{0}}{d\tau} & =1\protect\\
\gamma_{0} & =\tau
\end{align*}
}

\subparagraph{\textcyr{\CYRP\cyre\cyrr\cyrv\cyrery\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrr\cyrya\cyrd\cyro\cyrk}:
\begin{align*}
\frac{d\gamma_{1}}{d\tau} & =-\frac{1}{I}\sin\gamma_{0}=-\frac{1}{I}\sin\tau\protect\\
\gamma_{1} & =\frac{1}{I}\cos\tau
\end{align*}
\textcyr{\CYRV\cyrt\cyro\cyrr\cyro\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrr\cyrya\cyrd\cyro\cyrk}:
\begin{align*}
\frac{d\gamma_{2}}{d\tau} & =-\frac{1}{I^{2}}\cos^{2}\tau\protect\\
\gamma_{2} & =-\frac{1}{I^{2}}\left(\frac{\tau}{2}+\frac{\sin2\tau}{4}\right)
\end{align*}
\textcyr{\CYRT\cyrr\cyre\cyrt\cyri\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrr\cyrya\cyrd\cyro\cyrk}:
\begin{align*}
\frac{d\gamma_{3}}{d\tau} & =-\frac{1}{I^{3}}\left(\frac{\tau}{2}+\frac{\sin2\tau}{4}\right)\cos\tau\protect\\
\gamma_{3}=\frac{1}{I^{3}} & \left(\frac{1}{2}\tau\sin\tau-\frac{1}{6}\cos^{3}\tau+\frac{\cos\tau}{2}\right)
\end{align*}
}

\subparagraph{\textcyr{\CYRCH\cyre\cyrt\cyrv\cyre\cyrr\cyrt\cyrery\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrr\cyrya\cyrd\cyro\cyrk}:
\begin{align*}
\frac{d\gamma_{4}}{d\tau} & =-\frac{1}{I^{4}}\left(\frac{1}{2}\tau\sin\tau-\frac{1}{6}\cos^{3}\tau+\frac{\cos\tau}{2}\right)\cos\tau\protect\\
\gamma_{4}= & -\frac{1}{I^{4}}\left(\frac{3\tau}{16}+\frac{7}{48}\sin2\tau-\frac{1}{192}\sin4\tau-\frac{1}{8}\tau\cos2\tau\right)
\end{align*}
}
\end{document}
